long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to get away from the hassle of searching for a domain name between domain search platforms such as godaddy and namesilo? 
Do you want to stop moving back and forth between tabs to search a selected word?

If you answered yes to the above questions then you should really check out the Instant Domain Discovery extension .

With this plugin you are able to find and auto check for available domains on any webpage.

Check out social media sites for trending products, services, etc and check them automatically.

With this extension it's as simple as highlighting any combination of words, right clicking, and checking if it's available to register.
Examples of great places to try this out: Social Media sites, Trending sites, News websites, the list is endless.

So, stop doing the same thing as everyone else when it comes to finding domains and start carving your own path with this super simple extension for domains.

Instant Domain Discovery will be the last tool you will need to quickly search if the given domain name is available for registration on the platform provided.
